## How it Works:
1. Install the extension
2. Click the extension icon to open the popup
3. Toggle "Enable on all websites" or add specific sites to your list
4. Enjoy unrestricted right-click functionality!

Right-Click Enabler is the perfect tool for:
- Students who need to copy text for research
- Developers inspecting web elements
- Digital marketers analyzing competitor websites
- Anyone who values full control over their browsing experience
